ElectronicText.textData:
<#--Carousel Settings/Options--> <#--Width of Carousel Container Container & Image --> <#assign CAROUSEL_WIDTH="616"/> <#--Height of Carousel Container Container & Image --> <#assign CAROUSEL_HEIGHT="430"/> <#--Carousel Images Scroll Automatically "true" or "false" --> <#assign CAROUSEL_AUTO="true"/> <#--Carousel will start over after last slide shows "true" or "false" --> <#assign CAROUSEL_CONTINUOUS="true"/> <#--Carousel image display time in Milliseconds --> <#assign CAROUSEL_INTERVAL="3000"/> <#--Carousel starts when all images are loaded "true" or "false" ("true" is recommended) --> <#assign CAROUSEL_LOADING="true"/> <#-- Navigation on the right and left of carousel. Arrow images defined in CSS --> <#assign CAROUSEL_ARROWS="false"/> <#-- Button Navigation on the Bottom of Carousel "true" or "false" --> <#assign CAROUSEL_BUTTONS="false"/> <#-- Converts Buttons to Numbers (Note: CAROUSEL_BUTTONS must be "true" to function) --> <#assign CAROUSEL_BTN_NUMBERS="false"/> <#-- Trace x and y coordinates for the mouse "true" or "false" --> <#assign CAROUSEL_MOUSE_TRACE="false"/> <#-- Pause Carousel while hovering over individual image "true" or "false" ("true" is recommended) --> <#assign CAROUSEL_PAUSE_ON_HOVER="true"/> <#-- Stop Carousel on mouse click "true" or "false" --> <#assign CAROUSEL_STOP_ON_CLICK="false"/> <#-- Type of Transition (hslide,vslide,fade) --> <#assign CAROUSEL_TRANSITION="fade"/> <#-- Delay Length Between Transitions in Milliseconds (Default = "0") --> <#assign CAROUSEL_TRANSITION_DELAY="0"/> <#-- Speed of Transitions in Milliseconds (Default = "1000") --> <#assign CAROUSEL_TRANSITION_SPEED="2000"/> <#--Carousel Images --> <#assign CAROUSEL_IMAGE_URL_1="/osafe_theme/images/user_content/images/versace-shoe-1.png"/> <#assign CAROUSEL_IMAGE_HREF_1="/online/shop/shoes/suede-platform-pumps"/> <#assign CAROUSEL_IMAGE_URL_2="/osafe_theme/images/user_content/images/versace-shoe-2.png"/> <#assign CAROUSEL_IMAGE_HREF_2="/online/shop/shoes/suede-wedge-espadrilles"/> <#assign CAROUSEL_IMAGE_URL_3="/osafe_theme/images/user_content/images/versace-shoe-3.png"/> <#assign CAROUSEL_IMAGE_HREF_3=""/> <#assign CAROUSEL_IMAGE_URL_4=""/> <#assign CAROUSEL_IMAGE_HREF_4=""/> <#assign CAROUSEL_IMAGE_URL_5=""/> <#assign CAROUSEL_IMAGE_HREF_5=""/> <#-- Below is Carousel Code // All Adjustments should be made above -->
<#if CAROUSEL_IMAGE_URL_1?has_content>
<#if CAROUSEL_IMAGE_URL_2?has_content>
<#if CAROUSEL_IMAGE_URL_3?has_content>
<#if CAROUSEL_IMAGE_URL_4?has_content>
<#if CAROUSEL_IMAGE_URL_5?has_content>
